title: Social Determinants of Health (SDOH) Extraction
description: Event-based extraction of social determinants of health from clinical notes based on the n2c2 2022 Track 2 shared task and SHAC corpus. Annotates substance use (alcohol, drug, tobacco), employment, and living status with temporal and status attributes.
citation:
@article{lybarger2023shac,
    title = "Leveraging natural language processing to augment structured social determinants of health data in the electronic health record",
    author = "Lybarger, Kevin  and Yetisgen, Meliha  and Ostendorf, Mari",
    journal = "Journal of the American Medical Informatics Association",
    volume = "30",
    number = "8",
    pages = "1389--1397",
    year = "2023",
    publisher = "Oxford University Press",
    url = "https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/36795066/"
}
